MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA26 postcode area of Girvan, affecting properties in Old Dailly and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.39AM. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and carrying out further investigations into the fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 10.15AM on 05 December 2020.
